modules.name: Shuffle
modules.description: Randomly re-order the channels of a polyphonic signal. CV controls for seed and number of output channels.

modules.name: Calendar
modules.description: A variety of LFO-like CVs, Triggers, and Gates related to time and date.

modules.name: Seed
modules.description: Given a seed voltage, generates 16 random voltages, as 16 mono outputs and 1 polyphonic output.

modules.name: Ouroboros
modules.description: Sequentially step through the channels of a polyphonic input.

modules.name: Append
modules.description: Append up to 16 mono or polyphonic signals together into a single list, and output a CV controlled (length, start point) subset of that list as a polyphonic signal.

modules.name: Sight
modules.description: Simple scope wih a non-linear falloff.
